about_the_game:
Full-Scale Invasion is an armchair general RTS that puts the player directly in the battle as they command ground-to-space armies from the bridge of their very own capital ship. Not only does the conflict play out around them in real time, but NPC crew members react to the player’s strategic and moral decisions; having fleshed out personalities that can be discovered in between campaigns like an RPG, grounding the player both physically and emotionally in the universe of Full-Scale Invasion.

The World

Full-Scale Invasion is a fantasy sci-fi tale, with an emphasis on adventure and accessibility to the genres of Real Time Strategy and Science Fiction. Alien races throughout the galaxy are represented by anthropomorphic animals (i.e water buffalos, emperor penguins, etc), with unique cultures that take influence from medieval fantasy and high minded science fiction. Worlds and their environments vary from one another both in extreme weather events and general climate.

The Scale


With capital ships ranging from 2 to 8 kilometres in length, and mechs standing 8 to 12 meters tall, Full-Scale Invasion puts you in control of epic battles!
